descriptionHtml:
So, my friend came up with the idea of a sweetroll mace and i made it.
Now you can crush heads with a sweetroll mace!

For now you can only get this mace with console commands:
  help "mace of sweetroll"
and then you'll see the ID and then
   player.additem ID <number of maces you want>
press enter and boom you've got it

If you have any Mace of Molag Bal or sweetroll texture replacers they will be applied to this weapon.

I will make the mace temperable and as soon as possible and create a way to get the weapon (but not smithing it).

[b][b]Check my other mods[/b]
-"1-handed" series
